alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 5:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, northeastern Duval and southeastern Charlton Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 503 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. George to near Oceanway. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fernandina Beach, Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Nassau Village-Ratliff, St. George, Ratliff, Oceanway and Little Talbot Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
